cofh.api.block

Interface IBlockInfo


  • public interface IBlockInfo
    Implement this interface on blocks which can provide information about themselves. If the block contains Tile Entities, then it is recommended that this function serve as a passthrough for ITileInfo.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getBlockInfo(IBlockAccess world, int x, int y, int z, ForgeDirection side, EntityPlayer player, java.util.List<IChatComponent> info, boolean debug)
      This function appends information to a list provided to it.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlockInfo

        void getBlockInfo(IBlockAccess world,
                int x,
                int y,
                int z,
                ForgeDirection side,
                EntityPlayer player,
                java.util.List<IChatComponent> info,
                boolean debug)
        This function appends information to a list provided to it.
        Parameters:
        world - Reference to the world.
        x - X coordinate of the block.
        y - Y coordinate of the block.
        z - Z coordinate of the block.
        side - The side of the block that is being queried.
        player - Player doing the querying - this can be NULL.
        info - The list that the information should be appended to.
        debug - If true, the block should return "debug" information.
